doc.field: Reformed Dutch Church of East Williamsburg Sunday School minute book
Reformed Dutch Church of East Williamsburg Sunday School minute book

Minute book of the Reformed Dutch Church of East Williamsburg Sunday School, dated 1856 to 1902. The minutes document meetings of the Sunday School's teachers, and topics of discussion primarily concerned fiscal matters and issues regarding curriculum and instruction in the school.

Minute book of the Reformed Dutch Church of East Williamsburg Sunday School, dated 1856 to 1902. The minutes document meetings of the Sunday School's teachers, and topics of discussion primarily concerned fiscal matters and issues regarding curriculum and instruction in the school.

Minute book of the Reformed Dutch Church of East Williamsburg Sunday School, dated 1856 to 1902. The minutes document meetings of the Sunday School's teachers, and topics of discussion primarily concerned fiscal matters and issues regarding curriculum and instruction in the school.
The Reformed Dutch Church of East Williamsburg was established in 1856 and was located on Flushing Avenue in the Brooklyn neighborhood of East Williamsburg.
Source and date of acquisition unknown.
